description: Dalgona Challenges CTF/Security Testing Platform - Flask-based web application running on localhost:32768. The application displays a homepage with XSS 25 challenge link but challenge endpoints return 404 errors, indicating the application is either in development, incompletely deployed, or challenge content is missing.
notes: The homepage shows a Dalgona Challenges interface with a link to 'xss25' challenge, but the endpoint returns 404. The application only has a functional root endpoint (/). All common Flask patterns (/api, /admin, /debug, /health, /status) return 404. Directory listing is disabled. Static files are served correctly, suggesting the application server is properly configured but the challenge content/endpoints are not deployed or functional.
